title: FACE COVER - NOT FOR MEDICAL USE
subtitle: Mens Original
discription_head: HELP PROTECT YOUR COMMUNITY IN THIS FACE COVERING.
discription: Through the hard times and the good, we pull together as a community. Be a team player and help stop the spread in this adidas face covering. The soft, flexible fabric allows for easy breathing. It's reusable too, so you can cut down on waste by tossing it in the wash.
details1: Inner lining: 92% recycled polyester, 8% elastane mesh
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: ADILETTE SLIDES
subtitle: Mens Original
discription: The Adilette debuted in 1970 as a shower slide for the German national football team during the world's biggest match in Mexico before being officially released back in '72. It's been a style mainstay of adidas ever since. These slides stay true to the original look with a contoured footbed and 3-Stripes across the bandage upper.
details2: Color: Core Black / White / Core Black
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: BSC INSULATED HOODED JACKET
subtitle: Mens Original
discription_head: AN INSULATED JACKET FOR CITY LIVING
discription: Stay warm while you keep pace with the city. This adidas insulated jacket adapts outdoor tech for city living. Lightweight synthetic insulation adds warmth without bulk. A drawcord hood and elastic cuffs seal out the cold. Recycled materials mean it feels good on all levels.

subtitle: Performance
discription_head: A T-SHIRT FOR STANDING OUT ON COURT.

details2: Shaped and cut for active tennis motion

title: RUNNER TEE
subtitle: Performance
discription_head: A COMFORTABLE RUNNING TEE MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
discription: Every time you throw on the adidas Runner Tee and head out the door, you're signalling your commitment to yourself and to the health of the planet. The soft and comfortable t-shirt is made of recycled materials, one step adidas is making toward creating products with less environmental impact. We know it's just a first step toward a sustainable future. But that's where the journey begins.
details2: This product has been made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials using no virgin polyester.
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

discription_head: RUNNING SHOES THAT SUPPORT EVERY STEP.
